DataElement.preferredName: Person Race Data Source Data Value Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income).:A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent._The person or authoritative body who provided the information._A character or string that represents the information contained in a data field.:A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Major living subspecies of man differentiated by genetic and physical characteristics. There are four racial groups: Australoid, Caucasoid, Mongoloid, and Negroid.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.
